CharacterDao.insert_query: INSERT INTO characters (id, name, localization, attack_power, health_points, speed, hate_value, price, weapon, energy, avaliable_location, fetter, hate_matrix) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
CharacterDao.update_query: UPDATE characters SET name = ?, localization = ?, attack_power = ?, health_points = ?, speed = ?, hate_value = ?, price = ?, weapon = ?, energy = ?, avaliable_location = ?, fetter = ?, hate_matrix = ? WHERE id = ?;
